channel.title: Comments on: Community Artifacts for Library Staff

item.title: By: Dylan Romero
item.dc:creator: Dylan Romero
item.description: Amazing work on the lanyards Kemi, I love them! I have a number of ideas for creating community artifacts in the Makers Lab - one is to use the Cricut (https://home.cricut.com/cricut-explore-family) to create vinyl lettering of our values that can be stuck to the walls in the Makers Lab (or other areas of the Library). We can also use the Cricut to create vinyl decals of the Library logo and/or values that can be stuck to our laptops. I added these to our next check-in, thanks Kemi!
item.content:encoded: Amazing work on the lanyards Kemi, I love them! I have a number of ideas for creating community artifacts in the Makers Lab – one is to use the Cricut (https://home.cricut.com/cricut-explore-family) to create vinyl lettering of our values that can be stuck to the walls in the Makers Lab (or other areas of the Library). We can also use the Cricut to create vinyl decals of the Library logo and/or values that can be stuck to our laptops. I added these to our next check-in, thanks Kemi!

item.title: By: Christopher Shaffer
item.dc:creator: Christopher Shaffer
item.description: These are great, thanks for getting them for us!
item.content:encoded: These are great, thanks for getting them for us!
